Detailed Description

This class handles arrows objects. These arrows can be used at the start and end of PolyLine, Arc and Spline instances. See the Attributes::setBackwardArrowBool, Attributes::setBackwardArrowBool, Attributes::getBackwardArrowBool, Attributes::getBackwardArrowBool, Attributes::setBackwardArrow, Attributes::setBackwardArrow, Attributes::getBackwardArrow and Attributes::getBackwardArrow methods for how to use Arrow instances.
Author:
Anthony Liekens

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Arrow::ArrowStyle
 

Enumeration of arrow styles. The following arrow styles can be used to set the style of an arrow object : {\tt Hollow, Filled}

Enumeration values:
Hollow 
Filled 

enum Arrow::ArrowType
 

Enumeration of arrow types. The following arrow types can be used to set the type of an arrow object : {\tt StickArrow, ClosedTriangle, ClosedIntended, ClosedPointed}

Enumeration values:
StickArrow 
ClosedTriangle 
ClosedIntended 
ClosedPointed
